pages.info: Knife's are a new Tool/Weapon. They are available in all material tiers except Wood and Stone witch is replaced by Flint.

pages.text: Every Knife has an Attack speed of 2,2 and an Attack damage of:$(li)Flint:3$(li)Iron:4$(li)Gold:2$(li)Diamond:5$(li)Netherite:6$(br)They are also a effective mining tool for the following:$(li)Cakes and pies$(li)All wool blocks$(li)Leaves$(li)Cobwebs$(li)Straw-based blocks

pages.title: Killing Mobs
pages.text: When killing animals, their secondary drop (leather, feathers etc.) is guaranteed to drop once. For example, killing a cow with a knife transforms the odds of 0-2 Leather into 1-3 Leather. Ham can only be obtained by killing a Pig(Not guaranteed) or Hoglin(guaranteed). When you harvest Tall Grass,Wheat,Rice with a knife you also have the chance of obtaining Straw
